content: the river pebbles headband features the 2×1 broken rib stitch that is only a 2-row repeat the headband is knitted flat the first and last 3 stitches form an i-cord edging that makes the edges look neat and prevents them from curling the the cast-on and bind-off edges are seamed together forming a decorative twist in the middle the seam is hidden by the twist and is not visible
